title: Genesis Science Fiction Magazine Summer 2012
description: In this exciting new issue we have interviews by Carole McDonnell, Troy CLE, Penelope Flynn, Mishindo Kuumba. There are creative stories by Derrick Ferguson, Barry Nelson and Jeff Carroll. Also, an original comic strip by Tony Kittrell. We included original artwork by Jeremy Reed, John Garrett, Keef Cross, Andrew Kwame Danquah, Quinton Veal, Mishindo Kuumba I, Keef Cross, Jiba Molei Anderson, Marcellus Jackson, and Curtis Hamilton. We even included model photos of Actress Karita and Andromeda Sky!
author: Jarvis Sheffield
